item.description:
John Birch Society to host Presentation on Agenda 21 in Hollis


The John Birch Society will conduct a presentation on Agenda 21 at the Hollis Town Community Center Thursday September 20-7:00 PM. The presentation will be conducted by the Society's Regional Field Director, Hal Shurtleff. Mr. Shurtleff will discuss the roots and history of Agenda 21, ICLEI, how it is being implemented locally, and how to stop it.

Free admission.
For more information, please call Mr. Leif Parsell, the Society's New Hampshire coordinator at (203) 871-9312.
item.name: Agenda 21 Presentation
